cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.DM, cs.CC. 

This paper deals with the problem of chasing sets in a metric space, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry. The paper specifically focuses on the case of convex sets in Euclidean space, which is a classic topic in computational geometry and falls under the category of computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also involves the analysis of online algorithms and competitive ratios, which are topics in algorithmic game theory (cs.GT) and online algorithms (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper involves combinatorial arguments and analysis, which are topics in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and theoretical computer science (cs.CC).
